Result.Abstract: We introduce a new category C, which we call the cluster category, obtained as a quotient of the bounded derived category D of the module category of a finite-dimensional hereditary algebra H over a field. Result.Abstract: We introduce a new class of algebras, which we call cluster-tilted. They are by definition the endomorphism algebras of tilting objects in a cluster category. Result.Title: Cluster-tilted algebras

Result.Abstract: We provide a quiver-theoretic interpretation of certain smooth complete simplicial fans associated to arbitrary finite root systems in recent work of S. Fomin and A. Zelevinsky. Result.Abstract: Matrix mutation appears in the definition of cluster algebras of Fomin and Zelevinsky.
